title: Fit to Be French Fried
description: A CHARMING CULINARY COZY TO BE READ IN ONE OR TWO SITTINGS.  When an unlikeable retiree passes out while walking home from Felica's food truck, everyone dismisses the incident as a simple medical emergency, but Felicia's not convinced. Someone had a hand in Mrs. Dunn's collapse, and Felicia is determined to find out who and why.
author: Abby Byne
